document.full_text: actor james arness, who personified the tall, rugged lawman of the american frontier as marshal matt dillon on "gunsmoke," u.s. television's longest-running prime-time drama, died on friday at age 88.
document.title: "gunsmoke" star james arness dead at age 88
lines_and_colors: actor james arness, who personified the tall, rugged lawman of the american frontier as marshal matt dillon on "gunsmoke," u.s. television's longest-running prime-time drama, died on friday at age 88.
